item.title: Trailer-style video editing assistance for fiction project - Upwork
item.description:
I am a novelist and as part of the social media campaign for my new book release I am developing a series of videos to draw in readers. As such, I am compiling a video "trailer" for book series using stock video. I have an amateur level of skill with PremierPro and AfterEffects so I have developed a draft of what I'd generally like the video to look like, but it still has a somewhat amateurish quality. I am looking for some assistance from a more experienced video editor to take this to the next level.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 21:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Video Production Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Production Manager to oversee all aspects of video production for our company. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of managing and delivering high-quality video content on time and within budget. As a Video Production Manager, you will be responsible for planning, organizing, and coordinating all video shoots, editing, and post-production activities. You will collaborate with internal teams and external stakeholders to ensure that the video content aligns with our brand and meets the desired objectives. Strong project management skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment are essential for this role.

Skills required:
- Video production management
- Project management
- Video editing
- Post-production
- Communication skills

Hourly Range: $8.00-$14.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 21:05 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video

item.title: Editing of talking head video to be posted on YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
If this project has a successful delivery, I have a matching video with another set of products that I can award to the same editor in a new contract.

I have a video that is roughly 7 minutes long of a spokesperson showing clothing items from a local boutique. I would like the video to be edited with thoughtful transitions and effects so that the viewer will remain entertained for the final video.

I do have brand elements (font, logo, social links, etc.) for inclusion in this video either during the video or as intro/outro components.

This video will be posted to YouTube, and I do not want to run into any music copyright issues, so if you want to add music we will need to agree on the track in advance so that it can be sourced from the YouTube audio library.

You can see the first video here to get an idea of what the source content looks like: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Ji0dwLfBEE1lglLUqYk2xa972oxmz80N/view?usp=sharing

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 15, 2024 21:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Highlighting Effects, Social Video Enhancement, Video Annotation, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Highlighting Effects, Social Video Enhancement, Video Annotation, Video Editing, Video Production

item.title: Instagram Reels Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I want to hire someone to put together reels for me to post on my IG. I have many video clips that need to be put together to advertise various vacations and excursions that align with my blog post.

I want you to put the reel together and then I can do the voice-over work to put it on my page.

I would like to hire you to do about 4-8 reels a month.

When there is an upcoming vacation I want to collaborate on the reels that should be created so that you can provide insight into what content you need to create the best reels possible.

I want someone who understands Instagram and has time each week to work on at least 1 reel.

item.title: Video editor for online course to edit course videos - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for Online Course

**Location:** Remote

**Job Type:**  Contract- project

**About Us:**
We are an innovative online education company dedicated to delivering high-quality, engaging, and transformational courses to our global audience. We are looking for a talented Video Editor to join our creative team and help bring our educational content to life.

**Job Description:**

As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing video content for our online courses. You will work closely with our instructional designers, content creators, and subject matter experts to produce visually appealing and pedagogically effective video materials.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Edit and assemble raw footage into polished video content for online courses.
- Enhance video content with graphics, animations, sound effects, and other multimedia elements.
- Apply filters and effects to enhance the appearance of on-screen talent, including makeup enhancement.
- Collaborate with course creators and instructional designers to ensure video content aligns with educational objectives and standards.
- Ensure all video content is engaging, high-quality, and consistent with the company’s branding and style guidelines.
- Review and incorporate feedback from team members and stakeholders.
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and maintaining attention to detail.
- Keep up-to-date with the latest video editing software, techniques, and industry trends to continuously improve the quality of our video content.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a video editor, with a portfolio demonstrating your editing skills and creativity.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of video production processes, including color correction, audio editing, motion graphics, and makeup enhancement filters.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a remote team environment.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to provide and receive constructive feedback.
- Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
- A keen eye for detail and a passion for creating high-quality educational content.
- Experience in online education or e-learning content creation is a plus.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Bachelor’s degree in Film, Media Production, Communications, or a related field.
- Familiarity with e-learning platforms and Learning Management Systems (LMS).
- Knowledge of instructional design principles and educational technologies.
- Basic graphic design skills and proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, After Effects, etc.).

**Benefits:**

- Competitive salary based on experience and project scope.
- Flexible working hours and the ability to work remotely.
- Opportunity to work with a dynamic and creative team passionate about education.
- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

**How to Apply:**

Interested candidates should submit their resume, a cover letter, and a link to their portfolio or examples of previous video editing work to [email address]. Please include "Video Editor for Online Course" in the subject line of your email.

We look forward to seeing your creativity and skills in action!


Budget: $150
Posted On: June 15, 2024 20:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: [French] Creating Clips on ClipChamp from Twitch Live Streams - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are looking for a versatile, bilingual French-English virtual assistant who can help us with some of our work. Various tasks will be assigned, and we will train you remotely. Depending on availability and fees, there is the possibility of working 100 to 150 hours per month.

For a YouTube channel, you will be required to evaluate videos on the theme of video games, among other topics. Your evaluations will be used to prepare edits. You will have an important role and will need to be very meticulous and disciplined, in addition to having strong writing skills.

For the same YouTube channel, you may also be required to do video editing. We will teach you our working methods (we can teach you how to make clips if needed), provide our tools, and explain the values that should be reflected in these projects. You will have a very strict set of specifications to follow. You must be organized and rigorous.

Ideally, you are available to dedicate 23 to 35 hours per week to us and are willing to commit long-term, as we do not want to repeatedly teach our working methods. The work is truly enjoyable, the edits will not be tedious, and they will not represent the entirety of the job. You will manage the YouTube channel to directly post the videos.

Additionally, our channel is really cool, and we have some very original projects in preparation. However, it currently does not generate any revenue, and your service is a luxury we allow ourselves at the cost of many personal sacrifices. Please be mindful to remain modest in the salary you request and consider that you will be growing with us as our situation improves.

Having a good internet connection would be a real plus for large downloads and video conferences, as well as being passionate about new technologies, Formula 1, and/or video games, which are some of the topics covered on the channel.

Thank you for reading and good luck in your search for clients.

Michael

Hourly Range: $3.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 20:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Camtasia, Video Editing, French, AVS Video Editor
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Camtasia, Video Editing, French, AVS Video Editor
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Creative Gadzhi style Baby Youtube Channel Video Editor V2 - Upwork
item.description:
Project Details:
Voiceover: I have a voiceover that is 6 minutes and 10 seconds long.
Script: A completed writing script is ready to accompany the voiceover.
Video Content Requirements:
Engaging Animations: I am looking for dynamic and captivating animations that align with the voiceover content, rather than relying solely on B-roll footage. Here are some animation ideas (All of these do not have to be incorprate but what ever best fit the content):
Animated Characters: Friendly characters demonstrating baby care tips and routines.
Infographic-Style Animations: Presenting important statistics, tips, and how-to guides with engaging text and icons.
Step-by-Step: Clear visuals and labels for baby care activities like diaper changing and bathing.
Interactive Q&A: Animated characters answering common viewer questions with speech bubbles and text animations.
Data or Routine Charts: Illustrating daily baby or impotant statistical data and routines with colorful charts and animations.
Gadzhi Style Editing: Incorporation of elements of the Gadzhi style to ensure the video remains lively and engaging for viewers.
Target Audience: The video should primarily focus on a female audience, particularly mothers and caregivers. The content should be relatable and visually appealing to this demographic.
Purpose: The video is intended for my baby care YouTube channel, which aims to provide valuable content to parents and caregivers in an engaging and visually appealing manner.
Length: The final video should closely match the voiceover length, approximately 6 minutes and 10 seconds.
Visual Elements: Use of soft colors, soothing backgrounds, and gentle transitions is preferred to align with the baby care theme.
Additional Details:
Revisions: I would like to include up to 3 revisions in the project scope to ensure the final video meets the desired quality and content standards.
Format: The final video should be delivered in MP4 format with a resolution of 1080p.
Style and Tone: The video should have a warm, inviting, and friendly tone. It should evoke trust and comfort, making it easy for viewers to follow along and engage with the content.
Timeline: In your reply Please provide your estimated turnaround time for this project, including initial delivery and revision periods. The insert the words "Happy Day" :)

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 15, 2024 20:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply
